hero.core_tension: Choose narrower, higher-margin local windows over broad sitewide discounts during the holiday surge.
hero.setting: Small-format urban storefront with a cleared counter, branded premium display, and neighborhood footpath visible through glass.
hero.persona: Head of Retail leaning toward store-as-studio execution with on-the-ground team and a creator partner in frame.
hero.action: Finalizing a two-week local premium window: SKU selection, inventory tags, and messaging for in-store pickup.
hero.urgency_symbol: Half-lit clock face in background shadow suggesting a closing promotional window
props: single premium SKU on pedestal with limited-quantity tag
printed local offer card showing pickup slot times
stack of QR cards for in-store activation
handwritten two-week calendar on kraft paper
hero.lighting: Polished editorial; confident highlights on the premium SKU, soft negative space in the storefront depth.
hero.alt: Head of Retail finalizing local premium-window A/B test at storefront

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings (neighborhood to city) with radial arcs linking stores to creator events; inner ring is high-intent catchment.
elements: store tokens sized by baseline foot traffic
arcs labeled with % uplift and CPA ratios
signal_map.motion: Flows from creator nodes toward stores; thicker arcs show higher footfall uplift and lower event CPA.
signal_map.palette: Matte paper textures, warm retail tones, high-contrast accent for KPI labels; brass and slate materials for tokens.
signal_map.alt: CMO studying rings map showing footfall uplift and early-window share for local tests

case_studies.scene: Compact neighborhood store reconfigured as an experimental island with narrow shelves and premium bundle riser.
case_studies.moment: Store manager swaps a sitewide discount tag for a time-limited premium bundle and checks stock allocation list.
case_studies.persona: Store Manager executing store-level A/B test from the 'Local demand outpaces centralized plans' play.
props: two clipboard sheets labeled A and B with traffic counters
local pickup sign with short window times
case_studies.lighting: Focused key light on the bundle, softer fill across staff faces; clean shadows for clarity.
case_studies.alt: Store Manager running local premium-window A/B test checking footfall and conversion

case_studies.scene: Creator co-launch in the back of a store with a small camera rig and creator handing a co-branded pack to an arriving customer.
case_studies.moment: Creator-driven moment where a QR card prompts an in-store pickup and registers redemption at the counter.
case_studies.persona: Partnerships Lead testing creator co-launch funnels from the 'Creator co-launches shift media value to stores' insight.
props: stack of QR pickup cards in a dispenser
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial rim light on creator and product; soft ambient fill to keep focus on interaction.
case_studies.alt: Partnerships Lead running creator co-launch QR pickup test and measuring redemption
